H0.text: Who plays Mrs. Hudson in the BBC tv series ‘Sherlock’. Dame Judi Dench

H1.text: Who plays Mrs. Hudson in the BBC tv series ‘Sherlock’. Dame Maggie Smith

H2.text: Who plays Mrs. Hudson in the BBC tv series ‘Sherlock’. Phyllis Logan

H3.text: Who plays Mrs. Hudson in the BBC tv series ‘Sherlock’. Una Stubbs

A4.text: She appeared as Sherlock Holmes's landlady Mrs. Hudson in the BAFTA-winning television series Sherlock (2010–2017) where she was nominated for Best Supporting Actress at the Crime Thriller Awards.
